message_text: Today we are taking a break from your goal, @(parse_json({% for n in range(0,8) -%}fields.goals_dictionary_{{n}} {%if not loop.last%}&{%endif-%}{%endfor -%})[contact.language][fields.curr_goal]), and checking in on your progress. Press 1 on your keypad to proceed.
wa_template.name: {{wa_templates["post_goal_checkin"].name}}
wa_template.variables: @(parse_json({% for n in range(0,8) -%}fields.goals_dictionary_{{n}} {%if not loop.last%}&{%endif-%}{%endfor -%})[contact.language][fields.curr_goal])
